channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump and Powell are doing a ‘Fed independence’ dance. Keep your portfolio flexible.
item.description: Inflation shocks, the dollar’s decline and political winds are threats to your money now.

item.title: GE Vernova now sees tariff costs of up to $400 million but keeps outlook intact
item.description: GE Vernova’s stock surged Wednesday after the power and renewable-energy company reported quarterly profit that was more than double expectations.

item.title: Scott Bessent offers a gentler message again, saying ‘America First’ does not mean ‘America alone’
item.description: U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent spoke Wednesday at an Institute of International Finance event in Washington, D.C.

item.title: Tesla’s stock is rising, but will Musk’s return revive it for good? It’s not so simple.
item.description: There are various challenges ahead, including tariffs, an evolving EV market and a history of delays on new products.

item.title: Tariffs could push up homeowners insurance premiums — and people in these states would see the biggest price hikes
item.description: Tariffs on construction materials could push the average homeowner’s annual insurance premium up to $3,626 by the end of the year, Insurify projects.

item.title: Morgan Stanley says this language learning stock can surge almost 30%
item.description: The firm began research coverage of Duolingo with an initial investment rating of overweight.

item.title: Third Point's Dan Loeb says he's sold out of nearly all of his 'Magnificent 7' holdings
item.description: "We sold out of our Mag 7 holdings. Early on we got out of Meta, and reduced our Amazon. We got out of basically all of them," Dan Loeb said.

item.title: Deutsche Bank lays out 4 reasons why Tesla is rallying despite those terrible results
item.description: "Deliveries and sentiment could potentially be bottoming together," analyst Edison Yu wrote in a note to clients.

item.title: Gold miners are looking cheap here with the commodity at all-time highs, chart analysts say
item.description: Technical analysts are noting gold miners can play catch up to the commodity, and have further upside.

item.title: Here are Wednesday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Apple, Tesla, Cava, Toast, Roblox, Coinbase, Duolingo & more
item.description: Here are Wednesday's biggest calls on Wall Street.
